description:
StarCraft II is a science fiction real-time strategy video game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment.
Play as one of three factions across four campaigns in a battle for supremacy of the Koprulu Sector.

sc2-beta-after-044.description:
Apworlds for beta test. You need both of them.
For getting map/mod data, do `/download_data` in the client.
sc2-beta-after-044.title: Test apworlds

v0.6.4.description:
**Update**: Archipelago 0.6.4 has gone live, it is now the preferred way to play this apworld.

A downloadable apworld containing planned 0.6.4 content and cherry-picked bugfixes. Download the sc2.apworld file (ignore the source code downloads, those are out-of-date).
Check out the changelog [here](https://github.com/MatthewMarinets/ap_sc2_notes/blob/main/changelog.md).

After installing the apworld, you can generate a template yaml by running the Archipelago launcher and selecting "Generate Template Settings". Move the templates you want into the base Players/ folder and remove the rest. When you're ready to generate a game, run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe, and upload the resulting file from the output/ folder to https://archipelago.gg/uploads.

Notes:
* This .apworld _replaces_ the one in lib/worlds/; the live version should be removed and replaced with this one
* Because this .apworld and the live version conflict, a multiworld does not support both versions at the same time. Either all players play beta or all players play live
* This .apworld will not work with ArchipelagoStarcraft2Client.exe; launch the client by launching the general Archipelago launcher and searching for the starcraft 2 client from there
  * **Known issue**: There will be two copies of the starcraft 2 client in the launcher list; both should work the same. This is a byproduct of pasting an .apworld on an older install, and will be fixed automatically when upgrading to Archipelago 0.6.4

The custom mission order documentation can be found [here](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/sc2/docs/custom_mission_orders_en.md). Unfortunately it doesn't get hosted by archipelago.gg until they do their next version release.
v0.6.4.title: sc2 0.6.4 apworld
